mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIL_WISHLIST(w_seq, pd_seq, pd_name, pd_startDate, pd_endDate, pd_price, pd_image, u_id) VALUES((select nvl(max(W_SEQ), 0)+1 from TRIL_WISHLIST), #{pd_seq}, #{pd_name}, #{pd_startDate}, #{pd_endDate}, #{pd_price}, #{pd_image}, #{u_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRIL_WISHLIST ORDER BY W_SEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM TRIL_WISHLIST where u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY W_SEQ DESC
